title: Make Her Feel Good
lyrics:
(Co-Stars, Co-Stars, Co-Stars, Co-Stars)
And the R-O-C, niggas, yeah
Introducing newest acquisition to the R-O-C (S. Dot)
Roc-A-Fella, y'all
Young princess of the Roc, yeah
Teairra Marí
We gets busy, come on

Is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel
That wanna make a girl feel
Make her feel good
All I wanna know is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel
That wanna make a girl feel
Make her feel good
I just wanna know

Do I have to tell a nigga how to touch me (Huh)
Do I have to tell a nigga how to hold me (Huh)
Do I have to tell a nigga when to call me (Huh)
Do I have to tell a nigga I'm lonely (Huh)
Do I have to feel wrong (Huh) when it ain't strong
Keep my mouth closed (Huh, huh, huh, huh)
Can't a girl from the hood find a homie
That ain't just tryna (Uh) hang around me (Huh)
Do I have to show a nigga I'm a woman (Huh)
Do I have to apologize for my emotions (Huh)
Do I have to tell a nigga what to say to me (Huh)
Every time he wanna get next to me (Huh)
Do I have to settle for a cat that can't score (Huh)
Stroke his ego (Mmm, girl, no) (Huh)
Can't a chick from the hood find a homie
That wanna do more than spend money on me

Is there any boys around (Real boys)
That know how to make a girl feel (Aye)
That wanna make a girl feel (Make her feel good)
Make her feel good (Make her feel real, I wanna know)
All I wanna know is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel (Feel)
That wanna make a girl feel (So real)
Make her feel good (Gimme what is)
I just wanna know (I gotta know)

How come I got a nigga but can't trust him (Huh, huh, huh)
Why every answer to my question is a question (Huh)
Why can't my nigga be my own little something (Huh)
That every girl on my block can't say they done bumped wit (Huh)
I'm so tired of these so-called wannabe (Huh)
Hard cold pretenders that have no clue (Huh)
Can't a chick from the hood find a homie
That I ain't gotta tell how to put it on me

Is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel (Oh, woah-oh)
That wanna make a girl feel (Make a girl feel)
Make her feel good (Make her feel real, I gotta know)
All I wanna know is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel (Feel)
That wanna make a girl feel (So real)
Make her feel good (Give it to me real)
I just wanna know (I gotta know)

Oh, why is it so hard
For a girl like me to find a boy
That really knows how to make a girl feel
Girl feel, feel
Why is it so hard
For a girl like me to find a boy
That really knows how to make a girl feel
Girl feel, feel (I just gotta know, woah)

Is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel (How to touch a woman)
That wanna make a girl feel (How to treat a lady)
Make her feel good (How to make me feel good)
All I wanna know is there any boys around
That know how to make a girl feel (Girl feel)
That wanna make a girl feel (Girl feel)
Make her feel good (Make her feel real)
I just wanna know (I gotta know)
